message.game.description: &fCapture the opposing team's flag and fight to keep yours. Use your abilities to play as a team and surprise your opponents.
message.flag-captured.display: %team%&7 team flag has been captured by %player%&7!
message.flag-brought-back.display: %player%&7 has brought back the %team%&7 team flag to his base!
message.ending-game.display: &7All the flags will be destroyed in &b%time% minute(s)&f!
message.spleef.display: &cDo not try to spleef your teammates!
item.choose.name: &bChoose your ability
item.ability.name: &fAbility: %ability%
ability.gui.name: &8Ability: %ability%
ability.buy-gui.name: &8Confirmation of purchase
ability.type-lore.movement:
&7Abilities to move in
&7different ways on the map
ability.type-lore.build:
&7Build abilities, giving
&7the possibility to easily
&7edit the map.
ability.astronaut.name: &bAstronaut
ability.astronaut.lore:
&7Allows you to propel yourself
&7forward to surprise your opponents.
ability.shooter.name: &bShooter
ability.shooter.lore:
&7Allows you to shoot an explosive fireball
&7to knock your opponents into the void.
ability.runner.name: &bRunner
ability.runner.lore:
&7Grants a speed II effect
&7for height seconds.
ability.builder.name: &bBuilder
ability.builder.lore:
&7Allows you to create a temporary
&7bridge to move quickly.
ability.kangaroo.name: &bKangaroo
ability.kangaroo.lore:
&7Allows you to make a vertical jump
&7to go up quickly.
ability.ghost.name: &bGhost
ability.tank.name: &bTank
ability.tank.lore:
&7Grants a resistance II effect
&7for five seconds.
ability.barbarian.name: &bBarbare
ability.barbarian.lore:
&7Grants a strength I effect
&7for three seconds.
ability.bridge.name: &bBridge
ability.bridge.lore:
&7Allows you to create a temporary
&7bridge to move quickly.
ability.wall.name: &bWall
ability.wall.lore:
&7Allows you to create a temporary
&7wall to protect yourself.
ability.push.name: &bPush
ability.push.lore:
&7Allows you to push your opponents
&7away from you.
ability.scaffold.name: &bScaffold
ability.scaffold.lore:
&7Place a square of glass blocks under your
&7feet allowing you crazy movements.
gui.host.abilities.name: &8Abilities
host.category.rtf-main.name: &bRushTheFlag
host.category.rtf-abilities.name: &bAbilities
host.option.lives.name: &bLives
host.option.lives.description:
&7Set the amount of lives
&7of each team.
host.option.respawn-time.name: &bRespawn time
host.option.respawn-time.description:
&7Set the time before respawing
&7when a player dies.
host.option.game-time.name: &bGame time
host.option.game-time.description:
&7Set the maximum time that
&7will last the game.
host.option.remove-blocks.name: &bBlocks removing
host.option.remove-blocks.description:
&7Set whether blocks will be
&7removed after a given amount of
&7time or not.
host.option.spleef.name: &bSpleef
host.option.spleef.description:
&7Set whether players can
&7break blocks under their
&7teammates or not.
host.option.rtf-ability-enabled.name: &bState
host.option.rtf-ability-enabled.descript:
&7Set whether the ability
&7is enabled or not.
host.option.rtf-ability-cooldown.name: &bCooldown
host.option.rtf-ability-cooldown.descrip:
&7Set the time between each
&7use of the ability.
